text: Alun Michael born August 22, 1943, is a Welsh politician. He graduated from Keele University. He was the First Minister of Wales. He also was the first Minister of the National Assembly for Wales. He was a journalist for the South Wales Echo from 1966 to 1971. thumb | right | Alun Michael == References == Category:Welsh politicians Category:1943 births Category:Living people
title: Alun Michael
